title: Cattle Mortality After Storm
scenario: A client reports five cattle dead near a treeline after a heavy storm. You find wilted branches of Prunus serotina (Wild Black Cherry) in the pasture.

expected_responses.path: Mechanical/Storm damage (vector for ingestion of wilted leaves)

title: Notifiable Pathogen Detection
scenario: Citrus trees at Cairns nursery showing yellow shoots, blotchy mottle. Asian citrus psyllid (Diaphorina citri) observed on new growth.

expected_responses.path: Candidatus Liberibacter asiaticus (Huanglongbing/Citrus Greening) - Vector: Psyllid
expected_responses.vital: Tree decline metrics: canopy thinning %, fruit drop rate

title: Canine Renal Failure
scenario: Kelpie with acute oliguria after roaming rural property. Owner reports dog chewed 'lily-like plant' with orange berries near creek line.

expected_responses.tox: Insoluble calcium oxalate crystals (e.g., Arum maculatum)
expected_responses.path: Ingestion of insoluble calcium oxalate -> mechanical crystal deposition in nephrons
expected_responses.vital: Hyperoxaluria on urinalysis, rising creatinine, calcium oxalate crystalluria

title: Biosecurity Breach Investigation

expected_responses.path: Imported soil -> undetected queen transport -> colony establishment
